credibility_assessment: Board found applicants not credible due to lack of personal confrontation with FARC and supporting evidence
state_protection_analysis: concluded adequate state protection existed in Colombia
Applicants failed to seek state protection in Colombia
refugee_status_eligibility: Applicants claimed refugee status due to threats from FARC
legal_basis: Under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, claimants must prove lack of state protection and nexus to a Convention ground
